thread.title: Gulf Shores, Orange Beach brace for Spring Break 2017 with 'terse warnings'
thread.title_full: Gulf Shores, Orange Beach brace for Spring Break 2017 with 'terse warnings'

author: John Sharp | jsharp@al.com
title: Gulf Shores, Orange Beach brace for Spring Break 2017 with 'terse warnings'
text: Police in Gulf Shores and Orange Beach released warning letters, posted on Facebook this week, indicating they will not tolerate criminal and unruly behavior this year. The warnings come after last year's Spring Break became a security concern.
